name: Soul of a Snowman
description:
A game by JustTeam.

Global warming causes sea level to rise. A mysterious Ocean Heart can stop it from rising. However, the path to the destination is full of danger, especially the fire and a rising sea level. It is at this moment that a legendary snowman stands out and is willing  to deliver the Ocean Heart. 

Sacrifice is a must. On the Snowman reaching the destination, he have to melt himself in order to get the Ocean Heart out. But everyone is going to remember him, because of his true and warm heart hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw.

Help this snowman and feel his warm heart!

Background music: Silent Dawn by Dee Yan Key
